full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Details

* **Tender Title**: TBIPS – Stream #3 (IM/IT Services) - Chief Information Officer and Security Branch (CIOSB) Application Services
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01014207
* **Publication Date**: November 21, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 15, 2022
* **Amendment Date**: December 1, 2022

## Tender Details

* **Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to bidders who have registered for trade agreements, including Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others.

## Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Natural Resources Canada
* **Address**: 580 Booth St, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0E4

## End-User Entity

* **Name**: Natural Resources Canada
* **Address**: 580 Booth St, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0E4

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Daniel Burley
* **Email**: [daniel.burley@canada.ca](mailto:daniel.burley@canada.ca)
* **Phone**: 343-543-7809

## Notice URL and Attachments

* **Notice URL**: None
* **Attachments**:
	+ English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/7d11bb53c9807148c036684eadf0a6fa/npp_tbips_nrcan-5000070880_en.pdf>
	+ French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/454726a17bfef6359d0f7aab80636d1d/spict_apm_rncan-5000070880_fr.pdf>

Please refer to the attached tender documents for more information. 

You can access the tender documents at the following links:
